text: Native Foods is a fast-casual vegan restaurant chain that operates in California, Oregon, Colorado, and Illinois. The first Native Foods opened as "Native Foods Cafe" in 1994 in Palm Springs, California. == See also == * List of vegetarian restaurants * Veganism ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fast-food chains of the United States Category:Restaurants established in 1994 Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:Vegan cafés in the United States Category:1994 establishments in California
title: Native Foods Cafe
